<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Cathartic Focus Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2965) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 195 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Cathartic Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=97)

**Prerequisites**
[Cathartic Mage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2963)

</column>

---

You learn the focus spell listed under your emotion's entry. You can cast it only while in emotional fervor. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) while you use [Settle Emotions](/Feats.aspx?ID=2963).
name: Cathartic Focus Spell
